publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1176 John Swinney: Budget (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Budget (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Alex Salmond*, Bruce Crawford*
S3M-1176 John Swinney: Budget (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Budget (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Alex Salmond, Bruce Crawford
